Reach All Classes.--In order to reach all classes, we must meet them where they are. They will seldom seek us of their own accord. Not alone from the pulpit are the hearts of men touched by divine truth. There is another field of labor, humbler, it may be, but fully as promising. 
                                                                           39
It is found in the home of the lowly, and in the mansion of the great.--The Desire of Ages, p. 152. (1898)
